data.name: Strike Buster Prototype - Reed girl DLC
data.detailed_description:
TIPS:

  • This DLC is a DLC for fans. Only recommended for fans of Reed girl.
  • This DLC art is drawn by the original painter of Reed girl vtuber. The style of painting is different from the original painter of the game.
  • This DLC contains character voice acting, which is the original voice of Reed girl Vtuber and only in Mandarin Chinese.


About the Game

Here comes the new character--Reed girl!
The Reed girl DLC contains the following new content:

Three new relics


The Reed girl carries three kinds of relics, they are:

Yin and Yang Emoji: It can shoot colorful emoji bullets at any time!

Rational and objective laser gun: The more the laser fires, the more powerful it is!

Inclusive and open Lightning chain: The leakage of lightning weapons will spread at any time!

Special character animation effects



The character image contains dynamic display animation.

Enhanced pixel animation



Smoother pixel character animation effect with streamer effect.

Original Voice of Reed girl


Voiced by Reed girl Vtuber herself!(Mandarin)

Let's fight with Reed girl!

data.short_description: Here comes the new team member: Reed girl! New dynamic character displays, voice acting, new relics and enhanced pixel animation! Let's fight with Reed girl!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6320 (2*1866)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 7600 GS (512 MB)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel i5 9400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

data.legal_notice: The image of Reed Girl is authorized by Anonymous forum “Aisland” and  Reed Girl  vtuber.
